sum_bart: Olectra Greentech Limited is a subsidiary of the National Stock Exchange of India. The company is based in Hyderabad, India, but has offices in Telengana and Hyderabad.
sum_peg: Dear Sir and Madam, we wish to inform you that Olectra Greentech Limited has filed its annual report for the financial year ended March 31, 2018 with the Securities and Exchange Board of India.
